00021 /*
00022 Source :
00023 Matrix Orbital
00024 GLK19264-7T-1U
00025 Technical Manual
00026 Revision: 1.1
00027 http://www.matrixorbital.ca/manuals/GLK_series/GLK19264-7T-1U/GLK19264-7T-1U.pdf

00029 
00030 #ifndef _MOGLK_H
00031 #define _MOGLK_H
00032 
00033 /*
00034   I2C PROTOCOL
00035         START : Toggle SDA high to low
00036         Address : 0x50 (write) or 0x51 (read)
00037         Information : 0x48 0x45 0x4C 0x4C 0x4F
00038         STOP : Toggle SDA low to high
00039 */
00040 //TODO:I2C implementation and unavailable commands in this mode
00041 
00042 /*
00043   COMMANDS AND RETURN CODES
00044         Format :
00045                 Command1/Return1                Code in HEX format
00046                                                                 Parameter1[Range]
00047                                                                 (Comments)
00048                                                                 Parameter2[Range]
00049                                                                 (Comments)
00050                                                                 ...
00051                                                                 Parametern[Range]
00052                                                                 (Comments)
00053                 Command1/Return2                Code in HEX format
00054                                                                 ...
00055 */
00056 
00057 /*
00058   GENERAL COMMENTS
00059         Coordinates are always absolute from the top left corner
00060         Display is 192x64 so legal values are x[0-191] y[0-63]
00061 */
00062 
00063 
00064 // COMMUNICATION
00065 #define CMD_INIT                                                0xFE //Done
00066 // (Must be issued before any command)
00067 #define CMD_FLOW_CONTROL_ON                             0x3A //Done
00068 //                                                                              full[0-128]
00069 //                                                                              (Number of bytes before almost full
00070 //                                                                               0: full)
00071 //                                                                              empty[0-128]
00072 //                                                                              (Number of bytes before almost empty
00073 //                                                                               128: empty)
00074 
00075 #define RET_ALMOST_FULL                                 0xFE //Done
00076 #define RET_ALMOST_EMPTY                                0xFF //Done
00077 
00078 #define CMD_FLOW_CONTROL_OFF                    0x3B //Done
00079 
00080 #define CMD_BAUDRATE                                    0x39 //Done
00081 //                                                                              speed[See table below]
00082 
00083 #define BAUDRATE_9600                                   0xCF //Done
00084 #define BAUDRATE_14400                                  0x8A //Done
00085 #define BAUDRATE_19200                                  0x67 //Done
00086 #define BAUDRATE_28800                                  0x44 //Done
00087 #define BAUDRATE_38400                                  0x33 //Done
00088 #define BAUDRATE_57600                                  0x22 //Done
00089 #define BAUDRATE_76800                                  0x19 //Done
00090 #define BAUDRATE_115200                                 0x10 //Done
00091 
00092 #define BAUDRATE_DEFAULT                                BAUDRATE_19200 //Done
00093 
00094 #define CMD_NON_STANDARD_BAUDRATE               0xA4 //Done
00095 //                                                                              speed[12-2047]
00096 //                                                                              (2 bytes,
00097 //                                                                              LSB then MSB,
00098 //                                                                              Out of bounds value can cause display
00099 //                                                                              to stop working
00100 //                                                                              Value should be within 3% for the device
00101 //                                                                              to communicate)
00102 /*
00103                                                                                 Formula :
00104                                                                                                  CrystalSpeed (16MHz)
00105                                                                                 speed = ---------------------  -  1
00106                                                                                                   8 x DesiredBaud
00107 */
00108 
00109 // FONTS
00110 /*
00111   FONT FILE FORMAT
00112         Header (4 bytes)
00113                 Nominal Width (1 byte)
00114                 Height (1 byte)
00115                 ASCII Start Value (1 byte)
00116                 ASCII End Value (1 byte)
00117         Character Table (3 bytes per character)
00118                 High Offset MSB (1 byte)
00119                 Low Offset LSB (1 byte)
00120                 Character Width (1 byte)
00121         Bitmap Data
00122 
00123 Each character is encoded horizontally then padded to form a full last byte
00124 */
00125 //TODO: implement font file format
00126 
00127 #define CMD_UPLOAD_FONT                                 0x24
00128 //                                                                              fontid
00129 //                                                                              lsbsize
00130 //                                      msbsize
00131 //                                                                              fontfile
00132 // (Don't forget to set the new font metrics,
00133 //  see FILESYSTEM file transfer protocol)
00134 #define CMD_USE_FONT                                    0x31 //Done
00135 //                                                                              fontid
00136 #define CMD_FONT_METRICS                                0x32 //Done
00137 //                                                                              lm
00138 //                                                                              (Left Margin: Location in pixels)
00139 //                                                                              tm
00140 //                                                                              (Top Margin: Location in pixels)
00141 //                                                                              csp
00142 //                                                                              (Character Spacing in pixels)
00143 //                                                                              lsp
00144 //                                                                              (Line Spacing in pixels)
00145 //                                                                              srow
00146 //                                                                              (Scroll Row:
00147 //                                                                              Y location of last row in pixels)
00148 #define CMD_BOX_SPACE_MODE                              0xAC //Done
00149 //                                                                              value[0-1]
00150 //                                                                              (0: Off,
00151 //                                                                               1: On)
00152 
00153 // TEXT
00154 #define CMD_HOME                                                0x48 //Done
00155 #define CMD_CURSOR_POSITION                             0x47 //Done
00156 //                                                                              col
00157 //                                                                              row
00158 //                                                                              (Derived from current font base size)
00159 #define CMD_CURSOR_COORDINATE                   0x79 //Done
00160 //                                                                              x
00161 //                                                                              y
00162 #define CMD_AUTO_SCROLL_ON                              0x51 //Done
00163 #define CMD_AUTO_SCROLL_OFF                             0x52 //Done
00164 
00165 // BITMAPS
00166 /*
00167   BITMAP FILE FORMAT
00168         The bitmap is encoded into bytes horizontally
00169 */
00170 
00171 #define CMD_UPLOAD_BMP                                  0x5E //Done
00172 //                                                                              bitmapid
00173 //                                                                              lsbsize
00174 //                                      msbsize
00175 //                                                                              bitmapfile
00176 // (see FILESYSTEM file transfer protocol)
00177 #define CMD_DRAW_MEMORY_BMP                             0x62 //Done
00178 //                                                                              bitmapid
00179 //                                                                              x
00180 //                                                                              y
00181 #define CMD_DRAW_BMP                                    0x64 //Done
00182 //                                                                              x
00183 //                                                                              y
00184 //                                                                              width
00185 //                                                                              height
00186 //                                                                              data
00187 
00188 // BAR GRAPHS & DRAWING
00189 #define CMD_DRAWING_COLOR                               0x63 //Done
00190 //                                                                              color[0-255]
00191 //                                                                              (0:     White,
00192 //                                                                               1-255: Black)
00193 #define CMD_DRAW_PIXEL                                  0x70 //Done
00194 //                                                                              x
00195 //                                                                              y
00196 #define CMD_DRAW_LINE                                   0x6C //Done
00197 //                                                                              x1
00198 //                                                                              y1
00199 //                                                                              x2
00200 //                                                                              y2
00201 // (Lines may interpolate differently Left to Right and Right to Left)
00202 #define CMD_CONTINUE_LINE                               0x65 //Done
00203 //                                                                              x
00204 //                                                                              y
00205 #define CMD_DRAW_RECTANGLE                              0x72 //Done
00206 //                                                                              color[0-255]
00207 //                                                                              (0:     White,
00208 //                                                                               1-255: Black)
00209 //                                                                              x1
00210 //                                                                              y1
00211 //                                                                              x2
00212 //                                                                              y2
00213 #define CMD_DRAW_SOLID_RECTANGLE                0x78 //Done
00214 //                                                                              color[0-255]
00215 //                                                                              (0:     White,
00216 //                                                                               1-255: Black)
00217 //                                                                              x1
00218 //                                                                              y1
00219 //                                                                              x2
00220 //                                                                              y2
00221 #define CMD_INITIALIZE_BAR_GRAPH                0x67 //Done
00222 //                                                                              bgid[0-15]
00223 //                                                                              type[0-3]
00224 //                                                                              (0: Vertical from bottom,
00225 //                                                                               1: Horizontal from left,
00226 //                                                                               2: Vertical from top,
00227 //                                                                               3: Horizontal from right)
00228 //                                                                              x1
00229 //                                                                              y1
00230 //                                                                              x2
00231 //                                                                              (x1<x2)
00232 //                                                                              y2
00233 //                                                                              (y1<y2)
00234 // (Beware of overlapping bar graphs)
00235 #define CMD_DRAW_BAR_GRAPH                              0x69 //Done
00236 //                                                                              bgid[0-15]
00237 //                                                                              value
00238 //                                                                              (In pixels)
00239 #define CMD_INITIALIZE_STRIP_CHART              0x6A //Done
00240 //                                                                              scid[0-6]
00241 //                                                                              x1
00242 //                                                                              y1
00243 //                                                                              x2
00244 //                                                                              (x1<x2)
00245 //                                                                              y2
00246 //                                                                              (y1<y2)
00247 #define CMD_SHIFT_STRIP_CHART                   0x6B //Done
00248 //                                                                              ref
00249 //                                                                              (LSB: scid,
00250 //                                                                               MSB: direction
00251 //                                                                               0: Left,
00252 //                                                                               1: Right)
00253 
00254 // GPO
00255 // (Hardwired to 3 tricolor LEDs)
00256 /*
00257   LEDS LAYOUT
00258                 LED 1 - Top             GPO 2   GPO 1
00259                 LED 2 - Middle  GPO 4   GPO 3
00260                 LED 3 - Bottom  GPO 6   GPO 5
00261                 Yellow                  0               0
00262                 Green                   0               1
00263                 Red                             1               0
00264                 Off                             1               1
00265 */
00266 #define CMD_GPO_OFF                                             0x56 //Done
00267 //                                                                              num[1-6]
00268 #define CMD_GPO_ON                                              0x57 //Done
00269 //                                                                              num[1-6]
00270 #define CMD_STARTUP_GPO_STATE                   0xC3 //Done
00271 //                                                                              num[1-6]
00272 //                                                                              state[0-1]
00273 //                                                                              (0: Off,
00274 //                                                                               1: On)
00275 // (Doesn't affect current state)
00276 
00277 // KEYPAD
00278 // Default layout:
00279 #define RET_UP                                                  0x42 //Done
00280 #define RET_DOWN                                                0x48 //Done
00281 #define RET_LEFT                                                0x44 //Done
00282 #define RET_RIGHT                                               0x43 //Done
00283 #define RET_CENTER                                              0x45 //Done
00284 #define RET_TOP                                                 0x41 //Done
00285 #define RET_BOTTOM                                              0x47 //Done
00286 #define RET_RELEASE_UP                                  0x62 //Done
00287 #define RET_RELEASE_DOWN                                0x68 //Done
00288 #define RET_RELEASE_LEFT                                0x64 //Done
00289 #define RET_RELEASE_RIGHT                               0x63 //Done
00290 #define RET_RELEASE_CENTER                              0x65 //Done
00291 #define RET_RELEASE_TOP                                 0x61 //Done
00292 #define RET_RELEASE_BOTTOM                              0x67 //Done
00293 
00294 #define CMD_AUTO_TRANSMIT_KEY_ON                0x41 //Done
00295 #define CMD_AUTO_TRANSMIT_KEY_OFF               0x4F //Done
00296 // (The keypad buffer is reset after 10 key presses)
00297 #define CMD_POLL_KEY                                    0x26 //Done
00298 // (Returned code MSB flags 'more than one key press in buffer')
00299 
00300 #define RET_NO_KEY                                              0x00 //Done
00301 
00302 #define CMD_CLEAR_KEY_BUFFER                    0x45 //Done
00303 #define CMD_DEBOUNCE_TIME                               0x55 //Done
00304 //                                                                              time[0-255]
00305 //                                                                              (6.554ms increments,
00306 //                                                                               Default: 8)
00307 #define CMD_AUTO_REPEAT_MODE                    0x7E //Done
00308 //                                                                              mode[0-1]
00309 //                                                                              (0: Resend Key,
00310 //                                                                               1: Key Up/Down)
00311 #define CMD_AUTO_REPEAT_OFF                             0x60 //Done
00312 #define CMD_CUSTOM_KEYPAD_CODES                 0xD5 //Done
00313 //                                                                              kdown[See table bellow]
00314 //                                                                              (9 bytes)
00315 //                                                                              kup[See table bellow]
00316 //                                                                              (9 bytes)
00317 /*
00318                                                                                 Byte    Button
00319                                                                                 1               Top
00320                                                                                 2               Up
00321                                                                                 3               Right
00322                                                                                 4               Left
00323                                                                                 5               Center
00324                                                                                 6               N/A
00325                                                                                 7               Bottom
00326                                                                                 8               Down
00327                                                                                 9               N/A
00328 */
00329 //FIXME: Report it missing from codes list
00330 
00331 // DISPLAY
00332 #define CMD_CLEAR_SCREEN                                0x58 //Done
00333 #define CMD_DISPLAY_ON                                  0x42 //Done
00334 //                                                                              min[0-90]
00335 #define CMD_DISPLAY_OFF                                 0x46 //Done
00336 #define CMD_BRIGHTNESS                                  0x99 //Done
00337 //                                                                              brightness[0-255]
00338 //                                                                              (Default: 255)
00339 #define CMD_DEFAULT_BRIGHTNESS                  0x98 //Done
00340 //                                                                              brightness[0-255]
00341 //                                                                              (Default: 255)
00342 #define CMD_CONTRAST                                    0x50 //Done
00343 //                                                                              contrast[0-255]
00344 //                                                                              (Default: 128)
00345 #define CMD_DEFAULT_CONTRAST                    0x91 //Done
00346 //                                                                              contrast[0-255]
00347 //                                                                              (Default: 128)

00349 // FILESYSTEM
00350 /*
00351   FILE TRANSFER PROTOCOL
00352         Host                                                                    Display
00353         CMD_INIT
00354         CMD_UPLOAD(_FS | _FONT | _BMP)
00355         (parameters)
00356                                             (RET_CONFIRM | RET_DECLINE)
00357         CMD_CONFIRM
00358         -------------------Loop Here----------------------------
00359         NEXT_BYTE
00360                                                                                         NEXT_BYTE
00361         (CMD_CONFIRM | CMD_DECLINE)
00362         -------------------End Loop-----------------------------
00363 */
00364 //TODO: Implement file transfer protocol
00365 
00366 #define RET_CONFIRM                                             0x01
00367 #define RET_DECLINE                                             0x08
00368 
00369 #define CMD_CONFIRM                                             0x01
00370 #define CMD_DECLINE                                             0x08
00371 
00372 #define CMD_WIPE_FILESYSTEM                             0x21,0x59,0x21 //Done
00373 // (Be carefull with this one!)
00374 #define CMD_DELETE_FILE                                 0xAD //Done
00375 //                                                                              type[0-1]
00376 //                                                                              (0: Font,
00377 //                                                                               1: Bitmap)
00378 //                                                                               fontid or bitmapid
00379 #define CMD_FREE_SPACE                                  0xAF //Done
00380 
00381 /*
00382   FREE SPACE RETURN FORMAT
00383         Free space size (4 bytes LSB to MSB)
00384 */
00385 
00386 #define CMD_DIRECTORY                                   0xB3 //WIP
00387 
00388 /*
00389   DIRECTORY RETURN FORMAT
00390         Header (1 byte)
00391                 Number of entries (1 byte)
00392         File Entry (4 bytes)
00393                 Flag (1 byte)
00394                 (0x00: Not used)
00395                 FileID/Type (1 byte)
00396                 (1st bit: File Type
00397                 Next seven bits: FileID)
00398                 File size LSB (1 byte)
00399                 File size MSB (1 byte)
00400 */
00401 
00402 #define CMD_UPLOAD_FS                                   0xB0
00403 //                                                                              fsimagefile
00404 //                                                                              (Must be 16KB)
00405 #define CMD_DOWNLOAD_FILE                               0xB2 //WIP
00406 //                                                                              type[0-1]
00407 //                                                                              (0: Font,
00408 //                                                                               1: Bitmap)
00409 //                                                                              fontid or bitmapid
00410 
00411 #define CMD_MOVE_FILE                                   0xB4 //Done
00412 //                                                                              oldtype[0-1]
00413 //                                                                              (0: Font,
00414 //                                                                               1: Bitmap)
00415 //                                                                              oldid
00416 //                                                                              newtype[0-1]
00417 //                                                                              (0: Font,
00418 //                                                                               1: Bitmap)
00419 //                                                                              newid
00420 #define CMD_DUMP_FS                                             0x30 //Done
00421 
00422 /*
00423   DOWNLOAD_FILE AND DUMP_FS RETURN FORMAT
00424         File size (4 bytes)
00425         (LSB to MSB)
00426         File Data
00427 */
00428 
00429 // SECURITY
00430 #define CMD_REMEMBER                                    0x93 //Done
00431 //                                                                              value[0-1]
00432 //                                                                              (0: Do not remember,
00433 //                                                                               1: Remember)
00434 #define CMD_LOCK_LEVEL                                  0xCA,0xF5,0xA0 //Done
00435 //                                                                              level
00436 //                                                                              (Lock bits:
00437 //                                                                               0-2:   Reserved leave 0,
00438 //                                                                               3:     Communication speed,
00439 //                                                                               4:     Settings,
00440 //                                                                               5:     Filesystem,
00441 //                                                                               6:     Command,
00442 //                                                                               7:     Display)
00443 #define CMD_DEFAULT_LOCK_LEVEL                  0xCB,0xF5,0xA0 //Done
00444 //                                                                              level
00445 //                                                                              (Lock bits:
00446 //                                                                               0-2:   Reserved leave 0,
00447 //                                                                               3:     Communication speed,
00448 //                                                                               4:     Settings,
00449 //                                                                               5:     Filesystem,
00450 //                                                                               6:     Command,
00451 //                                                                               7:     Display)
00452 //FIXME: Report it missing from codes list
00453 #define CMD_WRITE_CUSTOMER_DATA                 0x34 //Done
00454 //                                                                              data
00455 //                                                                              (16B are accessible)
00456 #define CMD_READ_CUSTOMER_DATA                  0x35 //Done
00457 
00458 /*
00459   READ_CUSTOMER_DATA RETURN FORMAT
00460         Data (16 bytes)
00461 */
00462 
00463 // MISC
00464 #define CMD_VERSION_NUMBER                              0x36 //Done
00465 
00466 /*
00467   VERSION_NUMBER RETURN FORMAT
00468         Version (1 byte)
00469         (Represents the version number
00470          Hex    Version
00471          0x19   1.9
00472          0x57   5.7)
00473 */
00474 
00475 #define CMD_MODULE_TYPE                                 0x37 //Done
00476

00552 //Includes

00554 
00555 // Class definition
00556 class moglk
00557 {
00558         private:
00559         bool openPort(char* device = "/dev/ttyS0");
00560         void configurePort(void);
00561         void setPortBaudRate(unsigned long int baudrate);
00562         void setPortFlowControl(bool state);
00563 
00564         void transmit(unsigned char data);
00565         unsigned char receive(void);
00566 
00567                 void send(int message[]);
00568 
00569         public:
00570         moglk(void);
00571         ~moglk(void);
00572 
00573         bool init(char* device = "/dev/ttyS0", unsigned long int baudrate = 19200);
00574 
00575         //int autodetect(void);
00576 
00577         //int autodetectPort(void);
00578 
00579         //int autodetectBaudRate(void);
00580 
00581         bool setBaudRate(unsigned long int baudrate);
00582 
00583         void setFlowControl(bool state, unsigned char full = 0, unsigned char empty = 0);
00584 
00585         void display(const char text[], unsigned char font = 0, unsigned char x = 255, unsigned char y = 255);
00586
